      • WeaponItem

        public WeaponItem(int gDurability,
          int gDie,
          int gDSides,
          int gNumber,
          java.lang.String gName,
          java.io.File gIcon,
          java.lang.String gDescription,
          ItemModifier gSuffix,
          ItemModifier gPrefix)
        Creates a new weapon
        Parameters:
        gDurability - the maximum/current amount of durability an item has
        gDie - the number of dice used to determine the damage this weapon does
        gDSides - the number of sides on the dice used to determine the damage this weapon does
        gNumber - item #
        gName - item name
        gIcon - the icon for the item
        gDescription - description of the item

        public int durability(boolean MaxCur)
        Returns either the current or max durability of an item
        Specified by:
        durability in interface Item
